raw_json.html_title: Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) using R | R-bloggers
raw_json.main_html:
Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) using R

Posted on February 5, 2009 by Paul Gribble in Uncategorized | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on Motor Control Lab Blog » r-project, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

I found some useful websites showing examples of how to use R for various sorts of ANOVA (between, within, mixed designs, etc): Using R for Psychological Research Quick-R for SAS/SPSS/Stata users enjoy

Related

To leave a comment for the author, please follow the link and comment on their blog: Motor Control Lab Blog » r-project.
R-bloggers.com offers daily e-mail updates about R news and tutorials about learning R and many other topics. Click here if you're looking to post or find an R/data-science job.
